sentences.english: Why pay someone else to do it for you?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼要付錢讓別人爲你虧錢呢？

sentences.english: A bad compromise is better than a good suit.
sentences.chinese: 喫虧的和解強似勝利的訴訟。

sentences.english: But if doing so you certainly suffered loses.
sentences.chinese: 當然這樣很喫虧，假如你不想喫虧，就該去偷個漢來。

sentences.english: But if doing so you certainly suffered loses.
sentences.chinese: 當然這樣很喫虧，假如你不想喫虧，就該去偷個漢來。

sentences.english: She heard, I thought, to do the formalities tomorrow, he also sleep.
sentences.chinese: 她聽見了，心想，明天就要辦手續了，虧他還睡得着。

sentences.english: You will stand to lose if you do business with him.
sentences.chinese: 跟他作生意你是要喫虧的。

sentences.english: Tichmarsh's functional method and the deficiency index theory.
sentences.chinese: 的函數論方法與虧指標理論。

sentences.english: Passwords are an essential part of life online and if we are not careful about keeping them secret, they can cause big problems.
sentences.chinese: 網絡離不開密碼，密碼保存不注意，很可能喫大虧。

sentences.english: She knows that at all times heel firm the Feng dance, can't suffer a los.
sentences.chinese: 她知道，只要跟緊了鳳舞，就不會喫虧。

sentences.english: Disadvantage is a blessing, Do not have too much gas.
sentences.chinese: 喫虧是福，不要生太大的氣。

sentences.english: If you get beyond your depth like this , it is you who will suffer at last.
sentences.chinese: 你這樣打腫臉充胖子，到最後只能自己喫虧。

sentences.english: He thought we would be taken in, but on the contrary, it was he who got shorn.
sentences.chinese: 他本以爲我們會上當，可是喫大虧的反而是他。

sentences.english: The lei smell speech her dont easy to DE shi change immediately, lest suffer.
sentences.chinese: 亞磊聞言立即着她別容易對德仕改觀，免得喫虧。

sentences.english: Will England lose on penalties again this time?
sentences.chinese: 這次英格蘭還會在點球上喫虧嗎？

sentences.english: And if we're not careful about keeping them secret, they can cause big problems.
sentences.chinese: 密碼保存不注意，很可能喫大虧。
